title: User can quickly search for Professional Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to find a professional player quickly
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects "Professional Player" from quick search dropdown 
AND types in three characters
custom_expected: THEN search results are displayed in dropdown

title: Display of search results
custom_steps: WHEN the user types in three characters in search results
custom_expected:
THEN the results will display as follows: 
Highlight in bold the section of the suggestion that matches the user's search criteria 
Display at the top any matches closest to last name, followed by those closest to first name and Roster name matches 
Matches displayed should then be sorted alphabetically based on Last name, then Roster name and then First name

title: User can open player profile from search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to open player profile from search 
[C64683]
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on players name from search results
custom_expected: THEN player profile opens to be viewed and loads with the fixed header displayed at the top of the page

title: Search for guy that has not been active in the last three years
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is using quicksearch
custom_steps: WHEN the user types in a player who has not been active in the past three years
custom_expected: THEN they will not display in quicksearch results

title: Verify Advanced Search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user wants to do an advanced search
AND a magnifying glass icon that displays "Advanced Search" appears as an option at the top for all users.
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the magnifying glass icon
custom_expected: THEN the advanced search page loads

title: User can filter Results from advanced search
custom_preconds: Given the user has run a Major Contracts search in advanced search and has received results
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the filters icon and enters some criteria
custom_expected: THEN the results widget will filter down and only display what will match the filter.

title: User can export results from advanced search
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing results from a Major Contracts advanced search
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the gear icon and selects either of the export options
custom_expected:
THEN the results will successfully export 

Note: Please test exporting to PDF and Excel

title: User can open item from advanced search
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing results from MJ Contracts advanced search
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the Players name or Contract
custom_expected: THEN the item that they clicked will load

title: Club can view players current and previous contracts on Contracts Tab
custom_preconds:
Logged in as Club admin user 

GIVEN the user is on a Professional Players profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the contracts tab
custom_expected: THEN the tab will load displaying the Contracts history widget which displays the information of any current or previous contracts that the player has in the system

title: Club from signing org  can view players preliminary contract on contract history
custom_preconds:
Login: Club admin 

GIVEN the professional player has had a preliminary contract created and saved and the club user is FROM THE SIGNING ORG
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the players profile clicks the contract tab
custom_expected: THEN the preliminary contract will display on the contract history widget in red text

title: Club from signing org can open a players preliminary contract
custom_preconds:
Login: Club user 
GIVEN the player has a preliminary contract in the system 
AND the club user is from the signing org
AND is on the player's contract tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the preliminary contract year or contract level in the contract history widget
custom_expected: THEN the contract will open in edit mode

title: LRD/BOC can view any contract in any state
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has LRD/BOC permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the user searches for a player in any org
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to see all contracts regardless of the state

title: Club has permission to view contract if its from their signing org
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is from a certain org
custom_steps: WHEN they view the contract history of a player from their org
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to view the contract in any state

title: Club has permission to view contract for any signing org once state is terms confirmed or approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is from a specific org (example nyy)
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the contract history of a player from a different org ( Oak)
custom_expected: THEN they will only see contracts for the player if the contract has reached a Terms Confirmed Status or has been Approved

title: Superceded Contract Overlaps  with another approved contract for multiple years
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a superceded contract that ended in 2019
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user creates and approved a new contract for the player
custom_expected: THEN the contract history will only show the first overlapping year of the contract. It will not show any other overlapping years

title: Terminated Contract overlaps with another contract for multiple years
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a terminated contract that ended in 2019
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user creates and approved a new contract for the player
custom_expected: THEN the contract history will only show the first overlapping year of the terminated contract. It will not show any other overlapping years

title: Selects Major Contract
custom_preconds:
Login: LRD user 
GIVEN the user has clicked Create New button on the Contract History Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Major Contract
custom_expected: THEN a blank Major contract for the player will load

title: User does not have permissions to create contract
custom_preconds:
Login: Club basic (ex: test-{insert club}viewer account)
GIVEN the user does not have permissions to create anything new for a professional Player (Basic permissions)
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Contract History widget of a player
custom_expected: THEN they will not see the create new button on the contract history widget

title: Try to create new contract if player does not belong to the users same org
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in as CLUB A (any club)
custom_steps: WHEN they attempt to create a Major Contrat for an CLUB B (not club A)
custom_expected: THEN the system gives them an error message that a contract cannot be created for the player

title: Try to create new contract if player that is a Free Agent
custom_preconds:
Login: Club Admin User 
GIVEN a club admin user from any org is view the contract history of a player that does not belong to any organizations, making him a free agent
custom_steps: WHEN the club admin user clicks create new major contract
custom_expected: THEN the contract will load because the user is allowed to create the contract.

title: Move MJC through stateflow for player that is a Free Agent - Active Pending Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club admin user from any org, or BOC admin user views Major contract for a player who is free agent
AND the player's current status is Active Pending Contract
custom_steps:
WHEN Contract is moved from Ready for Signature -> Pending Approval
OR Contract is moved from Ready for Signature → Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
OR contract is moved from Terms Submitted → Terms Confirmed
custom_expected:
THEN contract status should be updated
AND system should generate a signed FA transaction to place that player on the signing team's roster
AND if the player's latest Sign Free Agent transaction's Report Date is empty and the current date is in the baseball season, or the Report Date is after the effective date of the Sign Free Agent transaction, then system should set the Player's MJ Roster Status to Not Yet Reported and the transaction history record's Post MJ Roster Status to Not Yet Reported
BUT otherwise system should  set the Player's MJ Roster Status to Active and the transaction history record's Post MJ Roster Status to Active

title: Move MJC through stateflow for player that is a Free Agent - NOT Active Pending Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club admin user from any org, or BOC admin user views Major contract for a player who is free agent
AND the player's current status is NOT Active Pending Contract
custom_steps:
WHEN Contract is moved from Ready for Signature -> Pending Approval
OR Contract is moved from Ready for Signature → Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
OR contract is moved from Terms Submitted → Terms Confirmed
custom_expected:
THEN contract status should be updated
AND system should generate a signed FA transaction in Submit to BOC state and effective date equal to the contract's Confirmed Date, or Signing Date if there is no Confirmed Date

title: Set contract to "Approved for Next Year"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has an approved contract for the current year
AND creates a contract with a future start date for the same player
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the second contract
custom_expected: THEN the updated status should be "Approved for Next Year'

title: Expire contract so Approved for Next Year becomes Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has an 'Approved for Next Year' contract via the steps in [C68758]
custom_steps: WHEN the 'Approved' contract expires
custom_expected: THEN the 'Approved for Next Year' contract should be moved to 'Approved'

title: Add labels to a file uploaded
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has uploaded a file
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects one or more labels from the label column
custom_expected: THEN the system will display all labels selected by the user

title: All subsections expand when section is selected from quickjump- edit mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing an MJ contract in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a section title for a collapsed section in QuickJump
custom_expected:
THEN system should jump the user to that section
AND the entire section and any subsections should expand

title: Contract subsections are automatically expanded when user expands high level contract section - View Mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing an MJ contract in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a section title for a collapsed section in QuickJump
custom_expected:
THEN system should jump the user to that section
AND the entire section and any subsections should expand

title: LRD user can copy and paste from MS word into WISYWIG editor- CUSTOM LANGUAGE
custom_preconds: GIVEN the WISYWIG editor has appeared for the LRD user who has selected Custom for Language on a clause
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user copies and pastes text from MS word in to WISYWIG editor
custom_expected: THEN the format of the text from MS word will remain the same and copy/paste is successful

title: CLUB user can select a language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has CLUB permission 
AND is creating an individual major contract 
AND is adding a specific clause to a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Language dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown will display the stored Club-entered and stored BOC-entered language options for that specific clause
AND will also display a Custom option 
AND the user can select any of the options displayed 
AND the user cannot have more than one language selected for the specific clause

title: CLUB user composes a custom language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the CLUB user has added a clause to the individual contract 
AND has clicked the language dropdown for the clause
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects custom from the dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the WISYWIG editor will appear in the contract form 
AND the user will be able to use the WISYWIG editor to construct custom language using basic formatting such as italics, bolding, underlining, and bullet points.

title: CLUB user can copy and paste from MS word into WISYWIG editor- CUSTOM LANGUAGE
custom_preconds: GIVEN the WISYWIG editor has appeared for the CLUB user who has selected Custom Language of clause
custom_steps: WHEN the CLUB user copies and pastes text from MS word in to WISYWIG editor
custom_expected: THEN the format of the text from MS word will remain the same and copy/paste is successful

title: Save contract with a Custom language
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract that consists of Custom language
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN the contract should be saved and language is stored

title: View stored languages directly on contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user wants to view the stored languages on a contract's clause
AND the contract's clause has a stored language
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'view' option for the stored language
custom_expected: THEN the stored language will open in a new window/tab

title: User Clicks Pay SCH button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add a Payment schedule to the contract they are creating
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the Pay SCH button
custom_expected: THEN the system will open a Payment scheduler pop up

title: User calculates Payment amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked on Pay SCH
custom_steps: WHEN the user populates the other required fields Principal Amount and Interest Rate and clicks Calc next to Payment Amount
custom_expected: THEN the system calculates and populates the Payment Amount Field

title: User calculates Interest Rate
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has  clicked Pay SCH on a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user populates the required fields as well as Principal Amount and Payment Amount and clicks Calc next to Interest Rate
custom_expected: THEN the system calculates and populates the Interest Rate field

title: User calculates Principal Amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked Pay SCH on a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user populates the required fields as well as Interest Rate and Payment Amount and clicks Calc next to Payment Amount
custom_expected: THEN the system calculates and populates the Principal Amount field

title: User clicks OK
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has filled out all required fields on the Payment schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks OK
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check and stores the values 
AND the user is returned to the Contract with the Pay SCH button updated to blue to reflect that a Payment schedule has been entered

title: Max salary cut rule
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the LRD user is creating a contract 
AND the max salary cut rule is not met (ex. Enter $100 for major league compensation Base and Guaranteed Salary)
AND the user is Updating the Status
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks override on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Pay schedules
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is creating a Contract that has multiple years
AND only one of the Years has a pay schedule
custom_steps:
WHEN the user updates the status of the contract 
AND clicks override on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Award or Performance bonuses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the LRD is creating a contract that has multiple years 
AND user has award and/or performance bonuses for some but not all years
custom_steps:
WHEN the user updates the status of the contract 
AND the override button is clicked on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Plate appearances
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the LRD user is creating a contract, 
AND the contract contains a performance bonus with a criteria of Plate Apperances
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for plate appearances are greater than or equal to 750
AND the user Updates the status of the contract 
AND clicks override on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Innings pitched
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the LRD user is creating a contract
AND the contract has a performance bonus with a criteria of Innings Pitched
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for innings pitched is greater than or equal to 250 
AND the user updates the status of the contract 
AND the user click override on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Games or Games started
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has a performance bonus with a criteria of Games or Games Started
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for Games or Games Started has a POS greater than or equal to 162 
AND the override button is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Game or Games pitched
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a LRD user is creating a Major Contract for player whose position is RHR or LHR
AND the contract has a performance bonus with a criteria of Games or Games Pitched
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for Games or Games Pitched has a RP(Relief pitcher) greater than or equal to 100
AND the user has updated the status of the contract 
AND clicked override on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Games finished
custom_preconds:
GIVEN LRD user is creating a contract 
AND the contract has a performance bonus with the criteria of Games Finished
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for games finished is greater than or equal to 100 
AND user updates the status of the contract 
AND the override button is clicked on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Signing date more than a month BEFORE current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a LRD user is creating a contract 
AND the Signing date is set to more than a month before the current date
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user updates the status of the contract
custom_expected:
THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

(Note: no warning message will appear for this flag)

title: Signing date more than a month AFTER current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a LRD user is creating a Major contract 
AND the signing date is more than a month AFTER the current date
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user updates the status of the contract
custom_expected:
THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

Note: A warning message will not appear for this flag when updating the status of the contract.

title: Terms Submitted > Ready for Signature
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract in the Terms Submitted state
custom_steps:
WHEN user attempts to move contract to Ready for Signature without correcting current flag 
AND clicks override button on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN the flag remains

title: Ready for Signature > Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is in Ready for Signature
custom_steps:
WHEN a user attempts to move contract to Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed) without correcting current flag
AND clicks override on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN the flag remains

title: Pending Approval (confirmed or not) > Update Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_steps:
WHEN a user attempts to move contract to Update Pending Approval (confirmed or not) without correcting current flag
AND clicks override on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN flag remains

title: Update Pending Approval (confirmed or not) > Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is Update Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_steps:
WHEN a user attempts to move contract to Pending Approval (confirmed or not) without correcting current flag
AND clicks override on the warning message
custom_expected: THEN the flag remains

title: Ready for Signature or Terms Submitted > Preliminary
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is Ready for Signature or Terms Submitted
custom_steps: WHEN a user wants to move a contract back to Preliminary
custom_expected: THEN the flag is removed

title: Pending Approval (confirmed or not) > Approved or Approved for next year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract in Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_steps: WHEN a user would like to Approve contract for this year or next, they must correct the broken rule stated by the flag
custom_expected: THEN flag is removed

title: Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed) > Terms Confirmed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
custom_steps: WHEN a user moves contract back to Terms Confirmed
custom_expected: THEN flag is removed

title: LRD should be able to see Flags on side nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract contains a flag
custom_steps:
WHEN an LRD user logins in 
AND opens a contract
custom_expected: THEN they should be able to see that there are flags present on the contract

title: Club should NOT be able to see Flags on side nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract contains a flag
custom_steps:
WHEN a CLUB user logins in 
AND opens a contract
custom_expected: THEN they canNOT see the flags on the contract

title: User Prints Contract Terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C63119]
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Print Contract terms
custom_expected: THEN a stand-in page will display until printing has been build

title: User Prints Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C63118]
custom_steps: AND has chosen to Print the entire Contract
custom_expected: THEN a stand-in page will display until printing has been build

title: Previous Salary
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the Previous Salary on a Contract Terms report
custom_steps: WHEN the user prints contract terms
custom_expected: THEN previous salary included should match the same value provided in ebis1

title: BOC user can view flags
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract contains Flags and a flag icon is present
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks flag icon
custom_expected: THEN the associated flag set that is contained in the form is displayed

title: LRD user can view contracts that need attention to in one place
custom_preconds: GIVEN that LRD wants to view contracts that need attention
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in and views homepage
custom_expected: THEN approvals clipboard contains contracts in Terms Submitted, Pending Approval, Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) states only

title: LRD user can open contracts that need attention to
custom_preconds: GIVEN that LRD user wants to open a contract that needs attention
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Type" from Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN contract is opened in either view or edit mode

*Test Terms Submitted, Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed), and  Pending Approval states before approving*

title: LRD user can review Club submissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club submitted a contract to the LRD
custom_steps: WHEN a contract is in Terms Submitted, Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed), or any Pending Approval state
custom_expected: THEN the LRD user is notified and can open and review contract

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Terms Submitted (LRD)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract is moved to Terms Submitted state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approvals Widget

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) (LRD)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract moves to a Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approval items clipboard

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Pending Approval (LRD)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract reaches a Pending Approval state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approvals widget

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Terms Submitted (club)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an club user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract is moved to Terms Submitted state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approvals Widget

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) (club)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract moves to a Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approval items clipboard

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Pending Approval (CLUB)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Club user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract reaches a Pending Approval state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approvals widget

title: Click on Paperclip when there's one attachment
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the approvals clipboard has one attachment on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the paperclip icon
custom_expected: THEN the attachment on the form will immediately download

title: Items to drop off clipboard- Terms submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the Approvals Clipboard is in the Terms Submitted State
custom_steps: WHEN the item is moved from Terms Submitted to any other state
custom_expected: THEN the item will drop off the clipboard

title: Items to drop off approvals clipboard- Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the Approvals Clipboard is in the Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) state
custom_steps: WHEN the item is moved from Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) to any other state
custom_expected: THEN the item will drop off the clipboard

title: Items to drop off approvals clipboard- Pending Approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the Approvals Clipboard is in the Pending Approval state
custom_steps: WHEN the item is moved from Pending Approval to any other state
custom_expected: THEN the item will drop off the clipboard

title: User does not want to be able to select Major Contracts or Player Agent Mapping items on Clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Approvals clipboard
custom_expected: THEN checkbox should not appear for Major Contracts or Player Agent Mapping items

title: Club Admin receives notification when Contract is moved from higher state to Preliminary
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract in a state higher then Preliminary
custom_steps: WHEN that contract is moved back to a status of Preliminary
custom_expected: THEN the club admin receives a notification on their clipboard

title: Club Admin receives notification when MJC is moved to Terms Confirmed
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract in the Preliminary state
custom_steps: WHEN that contract is moved to Terms Confirmed
custom_expected: THEN the club admin receives a notification on their clipboard

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved from Ready for Signature to Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract is in the Ready for Signature state
custom_steps: WHEN that contract is moved to Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their widget

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved to Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract is in any lower state other than Approved
custom_steps: WHEN that contract is moved to Approved
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their widget

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved to Approved for Next Year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has not yet been Approved
custom_steps: WHEN a contract is moved to Approved for Next Year
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their notification widget

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved to Voided
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract is in an Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN a contract is moved to Voided
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their notification widget

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved to expired (manually- not by batch)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract is in an Approved
custom_steps: WHEN a contract is moved to Expired
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their notification widget

title: Club user can view Action items widget
custom_preconds: Given the user has club permissions
custom_steps: When the club user logs in
custom_expected: They will see the Action Items widget

title: Club user receives Action item when MJC reaches an Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) state
custom_preconds: Given the club admin user has logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the contract for a player of the signing org reaches an Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed State)
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the Action Items widget for the Club admin update and resubmit to the LRD

title: Club admin user receives Action item when MJC reaches an Update Pending Approval State
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Club admin user has logged in
custom_steps: WHEN a contract for a player of their org has reached and Update Pending Approval State
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the Action items widget for the club to update and resubmit to the LRD

title: Club admin user opens Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) contract from Action items
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club admin user has received and Action item for a contract that reached an Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) contract
custom_steps: WHEN the club admin opens Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) action item
custom_expected: THEN the contract will open in edit mode for the user

title: Club admin user opens Update Pending Approval contract from Action items
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club admin user has received and Action item for a contract that reached an Update Pending Approval contract
custom_steps: WHEN the club admin opens Update Pending Approval action item
custom_expected: THEN the contract will open in edit mode for the user

title: Club user makes updates to Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirm) action item and resubmits to LRD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Club admin user has received a Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) action item 
AND has opened and made updates to the contract
custom_steps: WHEN the club admin user updates the status to Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed)
custom_expected: THEN the action item will fall off the Action items widget

title: Club user makes updates to Update Pending approval action item and resubmits to LRD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Club admin user has received a Update Pending Approval action item 
AND has opened and made updates to the contract
custom_steps: WHEN the club admin user updates the status to Pending Approval
custom_expected: THEN the action item will fall off the Action items widget

title: Club user opens player profile from Action Items clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club user is viewing the Action Items clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on a player name
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the Player's profile in the same window and tab

title: BOC creates a new agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to create a new agency profile and has permission
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'create new' from agency widget
custom_expected: THEN a new Agency profile will open in edit mode

title: BOC saves a new agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save an agency profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the 'save' button in the Agency profile
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check and profile is saved
AND Profile appears in Agency widget

title: Open Agent profile from widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to open agent profile from the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the agent hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN that agent profile opens

title: View Payment Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to view a player's payments tab
AND is viewing a player's contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the payment tab
custom_expected:
THEN payments tab will load
AND display deferred payments by default

title: Edit Payment Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to edit a contracts payments tab
AND the contract is in a terms confirmed state or higher
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the edit button on the payments tab
custom_expected: THEN the page will reload with editable fields

title: View Payment Defaults
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to view a player's payments tab
AND is viewing a player's contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the payments tab
AND there are no deferred payments
custom_expected:
THEN "Contract has no deferred payments" should display
AND First day of current month should display in the "as of" date box
AND rate found in system values should display in "discount rate" field

title: Populate Payment Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants the payment tab to populate
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the save button on a contract
custom_expected: THEN the payment tab should populate

title: Deferred payments
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing the payments tab of a contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a different option from the dropdowns
AND clicks view
custom_expected: THEN page refreshes with proper filters implemented

title: View payment by date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to search for a payment by date
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a date in the 'as of' section
AND clicks view
custom_expected:
THEN list filters correct dates
AND correctly filters other dropdowns

title: Discount rate
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the payment tab based on the discount rate
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a value in the discount rate field
AND clicks 'View' button
custom_expected: THEN the page reloads with correct filtering

title: User unable to enter invalid criteria
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has entered invalid data into any of the fields in the payment tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks view
custom_expected: THEN an error message pops up

title: Add Payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to add a payment to a player's pay schedule
AND is in the payment tab
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the add row button on the pay schedule
custom_expected:
THEN another row will be added to the pay schedule
AND users cannot see the add payment button in view mode

title: Remove Payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to remove a payment from a player's pay schedule
AND is in the payments tab
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the trash icon next to a payment
custom_expected:
THEN the payment row is removed from the pay schedule
AND users cannot see the trash icon in view mode

title: Player History Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants the player's history to be updated depending on contract state
custom_steps: WHEN the contract is approved
custom_expected: THEN Description is in correct format in black font

title: Spreadsheet upload
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the LRD wants to upload a Player/Agent spreadsheet
AND the user selects the "Import Spreadsheet" button from the Agent widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the file browser opens accepting only correct file types
AND the user selects a file
AND the spreadsheet has no errors
custom_expected:
THEN a loading indicator appears
AND system runs a rules check
AND window closes

title: Unsaved Data Warning
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is editing a contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks payments tab without saving first
custom_expected: THEN warning message displays prompting user to save changes made

title: 'As Of' Default
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the payments tab
custom_expected: THEN the "As of" Date will be set the July 1st of the current year.

title: Payment Source
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the payments tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
AND the player has belonged to more than one club over the course of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks payment source
custom_expected: THEN the clubs are listed in the dropdown and the user must select which club will be the payment source

title: Calculate Payment Amount
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to a contract's payments tab
AND is in edit mode
AND has entered amounts in Principal amount and Interest Rate
AND Payment date is AFTER Accrual date
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks calculate
custom_expected: THEN payment amount populates

title: Calculate Principal Amount
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to the payments tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
AND has entered values in payment amount and interest rate
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks calculate
custom_expected: THEN principal amount populates

title: Calculate Interest Rate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has navigated to the payments tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
AND has entered values in payment and principal amount fields
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks calculate
custom_expected: THEN interest rate is populated

title: Save Changes in Payment Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is in the payments tab of a contract
AND is in edit mode
AND has made changes to the payment schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules checks for errors
AND loads the page in view mode
AND displays a blue successful save notification

title: Re-Add Deleted Payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has deleted a payment source from the payments tab
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks 'Payment Source'
AND clicks the deleted payment source
custom_expected:
THEN the payment source should reappear on the payments tab
AND populated values should be calculated from the contract

title: Change View to Modified
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has modified payments in the payment tab
AND is NOT in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the 'View Modified' link
custom_expected:
THEN page reloads with modified payments schedule
AND accounts for any other changes

title: Change View to Calculated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has modified a payment on the payment tab
AND is NOT in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the 'View Calculated' link
custom_expected:
THEN the system will ignore any changes made
AND reload with only the values entered in pay schedules

AND user wants to view Payments screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the Payments tab on a Major League Contract
custom_expected: THEN Payments screen is visible to the user

AND user has permissions to edit MJ Contracts
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the Payments Screen tab
custom_expected:
THEN Payments screen is visible to the user
AND user is able to edit Payments Screen

title: Basic Club user attempts to view Payments screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a Basic Club user
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing a MJ Contract
custom_expected: THEN Payments Screen tab should not be visible to the user

title: Quick-Jump
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is viewing an MJ Contract
AND QuickJump menu is available on the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks QuickJump menu
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to jump instantly to any section of the contract
AND user should be able to expand and collapse contract sections

title: BOC Admin view batches screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user navigated to the system admin page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the batches tab
custom_expected:
THEN MJC displays
AND sections can expand and collapse
AND quick jump is available and works
AND Responsiveness follows wireframe

title: BOC admin wants to run MJC Stat Batch in Report mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC admin user is logged in and wants to see which contracts would be updated by the MJ Stat batch
AND user has navigated to the MJ Contracts stat batch on the batches screen
AND "Report" appears as an option for "Mode" dropdown in batch parameters
AND user has selected "Report" from the "Mode' dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Run"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch MJ Contracts Statistics batch
AND batch should not check for errors
AND all contracts that meet requirements should NOT be updated in the system
AND no statistic based bonuses should be earned
AND results from the batch should display in results widget when back is finished
AND if any item has an error, the error should NOT display in the error column to the left of the item in the results widget
AND batch History widget should update with latest batch history information

title: BOC admin wants to run MJC Stat Batch in Test mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC admin user is logged in and viewing the MJ Contracts Stat batch on the Batches screen in the System Admin dashboard
AND "Test" appears as an option in the "Mode" dropdown in the batch parameters
AND user has selected "Test" in the "Mode" dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Run"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch MJ Contracts Statistics batch 
AND test mode should run the batch and then roll back any changes made during processing - so that it can find any errors and what updates could actually be committed if you were to run the batch in update mode right now
AND contracts that meet requirements should NOT be updated in the system on the front end
AND no statistics based bonuses should be earned
AND results from the batch should display in results widget when batch is finished
AND if any item has an error, the error should display in the error column to the left of the item in the results widget
AND batch History widget should update with latest batch history information

title: As a user I want the MJC Stat batch to use the same mechanism to get stats as the rest of the system
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants the MJC stat batch to use the same source for stats as the stats tab of player profile
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the MJC stat batch
custom_expected:
THEN system should use the same source for stats as the stats tab on the player profile
AND MJ Stat batch should still work the same after this change, and generate the proper notifications and contract updates. Only the source for the stats should change

title: BOC admin view MJ Contract Statistics batch screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to the batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the MJC stat batch link
custom_expected:
THEN available batch parameters fields will display and function in a widget at the top of the batch screen
AND Mode and Run As dropdown fields will display and function in batch parameters widget
AND Run and Back buttons will appear and function
AND widgets follow wireframe and AC

title: BOC admin navigates back to batches screen from MJC stat batch screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a specific batch's screen (MJ Stat Batch)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks close on the batch parameters widget
custom_expected: THEN user is returned to the Batch screen

title: BOC admin runs MJC stat batch in update mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing the batch parameters widget on the MJC stat batch screen 
AND has selected 'update' from mode dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'run'
custom_expected:
THEN stat batch will run
AND Batch will check for errors
AND All contracts that meet requirements will be updated on the front end

title: MJC stat batch runs in nightly mode
custom_preconds: MJC Stats Batch is set to run nightly
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Nightly Batch Progress screen
AND searches for MJC Stat Batch (which is currently #29)
custom_expected: THEN MJC Stat Batch's "Last Run" timestamp should show a date/time between midnight and 1am (on average) of the current date.

title: Results from most recent batch will always appear
custom_preconds: GIVEN the MJC stat batch has previously been run
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the MJC Stat batch screen
custom_expected: THEN the results from the most recent batch will display

title: User can view the history of the MJC stat
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the MJC stat batch
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the batch history widget
custom_expected:
THEN they will see a list of when the batch was run in the past year (check date picker being defaulted to one year in the past to present day) 
AND columns will batch wireframe http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=contrat_expiration

title: LRD view progress of a running batch
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the MJC stat batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks RUN
custom_expected:
THEN a progress bar will appear and will show the progress of the running batch 
AND Abort button will replace the Run and Close Buttons

title: LRD Abort a batch that is running
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the MJC stat batch screen
AND the batch is running
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Abort
custom_expected:
THEN the batch will stop 
AND the screen will refresh 
AND the results will display all records that were processed before the batch was stopped.

title: LRD wants to see results of a past batch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the MJC stat batch screen 
AND is viewing the batch history widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on an batch history item from a previous batch
custom_expected: THEN the results from that past batch will display in the results widget

title: BOC user wants to see Parameters used for batch in batch history
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Batch History widget
custom_expected:
THEN the Batch History Widget should match styling and layout in wireframe
AND Batch History Columns should match those in wireframe, including "Details" column outlining parameters selected for the relevant batch run

title: BOC admin user wants to view list of MJC Batches
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC admin user
AND user has navigated to the Batches tab on the system admin screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Batches tab on the system admin screen
custom_expected:
THEN each Batch name should be a link and display under the Major Contracts Subsection
AND batch names: "MJ Contracts Statistics Batch", "Contract Expiration Batch", "MJ Award Bonus Batch" should display
AND batch names should display in alphabetical order
AND when user hovers over a batch name, a description should appear in browser tooltip
AND MJC Stat Batch Description should be: "Check against BAM"
AND the Last Run information (date, time, and the user who ran the last batch) should display to the right of the batch name as "Last Run: mm/dd/yyyy - hh:mm pm (username)"

title: BOC admin user wants to view batch screen while batches are running
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC admin user
AND one or more batches is currently running
custom_steps: WHEN user has navigated to the Batches screen
custom_expected:
THEN the number of batches running should display in the header (see wireframe)
AND only the sections that have batches running should be expanded. Sections with no batches running should be collapsed
AND the batch that is running should be identified with Running and the user who started the batch to the right of the batch name
AND if no batches are running "No batches are currently running" should display in the header and all sections should be collapsed
AND The page should not update in real time, updates should be made when the page refreshes

title: Update Batch Results and Batch History widget as a batch is running
custom_preconds: GIVEN a batch is currently running
custom_steps: WHEN user views the 2 batch widgets
custom_expected: THEN the 2 batch widgets should be updating on a regular basis

title: BOC user can edit Season Days
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD is viewing the Payroll tab of an approved contract
custom_steps: WHEN they click edit, updates Season dates fields, and click save
custom_expected: THEN the changes they made will save successfully

title: Club user cannot edit Season Days
custom_steps: WHEN Club views Payroll tab of an approved contract from their org
custom_expected: THEN they will not have an edit button

title: BOC can only enter whole numbers
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user is editing Season Days
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters decimals and clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN they will receive and error that they must enter whole numbers

title: LRD can see if any values have been modified
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD has made edits to season days
custom_steps: WHEN they click Save
custom_expected: THEN the number will be highlighted to indicate that a change was made

title: As of date depends on which is earlier - Terms Confirmed or Signing Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an approved contract with the Terms Confirmed date BEFORE the signing date
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the payroll tab
custom_expected: THEN the As of Date will be the same as the Terms confirmed date. (will always be the earlier date of the two)

title: BOC can view LRD 40- Man Payroll Impact on Payroll Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an approved Contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the payroll tab
custom_expected: THEN the LRD 40- Man Payroll Impact section will display

title: BOC can view CBT Impact on Payroll tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an approved contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the Payroll tab
custom_expected: THEN the CBT Impact section will display

title: LRD user wants to add a new "As Of" date on the Payroll Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as an LRD user
AND user is viewing Payroll Tab
AND Payroll Tab is in edit mode
AND there is the option to add a new "As Of Date" to the Payroll Tab
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "New As Of Date" link above the As of Date field
custom_expected:
THEN system should open a pop-up that allows the user to pick a new calendar date to add as the new As Of Date. 
AND user should be forced to enter a valid date
AND save and Cancel buttons should be available on the pop-up
AND clicking "Cancel" should cancel the addition of the new date
AND clicking "Apply" should confirm the entry of the new date and refresh the screen to display the new date in the "As Of Date" dropdown
AND the new As Of Date should not be officially added to the system until the Payroll tab is saved
AND when a new as of date is added, comments, override CBT rate, manual supersede offset, and remove from reports values should always carry forward from the prior as of date record
AND if the calculated values for a particular “bucket” have not changed since the last as of date, and the last as of date had that “bucket” manually updated by a user, the manually updated value should carry forward to the new as of date

title: User wants to see which values have changed on the payroll tab since the last As Of Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN an "As Of Date" has been previously created on the payroll tab
custom_steps: WHEN a new "As Of Date" is created by an action in the system (batch marking a bonus earned, someone manually updating a contract, etc.) any values in the Payroll or Season Days section that differ from the previous As Of date should appear in a different color text than the remainder of the screen
custom_expected:
THEN system should flag the values displayed on the Payroll tab that have been updated since the last As Of date
AND any values in the Payroll or Season Days section that differ from the previous As Of date should appear in a different color text than the remainder of the screen
AND any columns that contain the different color texts should display an orange flag at the top of the column to indicate that there is a new value contained in the column
AND if a change is found in a column with an expansion, the main level column should have a flag, as well as whichever (or all) of the columns contained within the expansion that have changed values
BUT if a column has no changes, no flag should be shown on the individual column
AND these flags should always be dismissed when a new As Of date is added to the system for this Payroll tab. (Only the latest As Of Date will ever show these flags)

title: LRD user wants to delete an "As Of" date on the Payroll Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as an LRD user
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Payroll Tab in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there should be the option to delete the "As Of Date" being viewed
AND "Delete" link should appear above the As of Date field if this is not the only As Of date present for the Payroll tab
AND clicking this link should ask the user to confirm the deletion of the As Of Date currently being viewed 
AND yes and No buttons should be available on the blocker
AND clicking "No" should cancel the deletion of the date
AND clicking "Yes" should remove the currently selected As Of Date
AND after a successful deletion the payroll tab should reload to display the most recent As Of Date
AND user must click "Save" on the Payroll to finalize the deletion of the As Of Date
BUT if only one as of date is present, "Delete" link should not appear

title: User wants saving changes to MJC to create a new As Of Date for the Payroll Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a MJC exists in a preliminary or higher state (including the initial state change to Approved)
AND newly added payroll values on the MJC are different than their previous values
custom_steps: WHEN the MJC is saved
custom_expected:
THEN the CBT calculation should be run for that MJC
AND at the completion of the calculation, a new As Of Date should be created for the contract and should be reflected on the Payroll tab with the new calculations
AND users should receive a blue notification that states "Generated new CBT As of Date" along with any relevant successful save updates the contract would normally receive

title: LRD user wants to edit an "As Of" date on the Payroll Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as an LRD user
AND user is viewing the Payroll tab in edit mode
AND there is the option to edit an existing "As Of Date" from the Payroll tab (not displayed in view mode)
AND "Edit" link appears above the "As Of Date" field
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks teh "Edit" link
custom_expected:
THEN a popup should open that allows the user to pick a new calendar date for the selected As Of Date
AND user should be forced to enter a valid date
AND apply and Cancel buttons should be available on the pop-up
AND clicking "Cancel" should cancel the edit
AND clicking "Apply" should apply the new value to the selected as of date
AND user must save the Payroll screen for the edit to be maintained
AND cancelling changes to the payroll tab should set the As Of Date back to its original value
AND after a successful Save the contract should reload to display the newly updated As Of Date

title: User wants to flag an "As Of" date to be removed from reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in and wants to flag an As Of Date to be removed from reports
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Payroll tab
custom_expected:
THEN Payroll tab should have an "Additional Settings" collapsible section that matches the wireframe
AND "Remove From Reports" should be a checkbox available in the Additional Settings section
AND checking off the Remove from Reports checkbox should flag the As Of Date to be removed from all CBT and Payroll report calculations
AND any reports should not reflect any of the information contained on the current As Of Date. (won't be testable for the purposes of this test case so should just check that this is editable and remains checked on an "As of Date" basis.)
AND the checkbox setting should carry forward to the next As Of Date until it is manually removed.

title: UI of payroll tab should match updated wire
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to view the Payroll Tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the payroll tab
custom_expected: THEN payroll tab layout should match the updated wireframe (http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll)

title: User wants to edit and save changes to Payroll Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as an LRD user
AND user has navigated to the Payroll Tab
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should reload both Season Days and the Payroll Section into edit mode
AND a "Save" button should be available on the form whenever the form is in edit mode
AND a "Cancel" button should be available on the form whenever the form is in edit mode
AND clicking Cancel should ask the user to confirm the cancellation of any changes
AND  if user confirms, any edits made should be cancelled and the form should be refreshed into view mode
BUT if user does not confirm, the pop up should be closed and the user should be returned to the form in edit mode
AND clicking Save should run a required field and format check on the form
AND Errors should be displayed in the system's standard required field and formatting error messages
AND global error handling, including sticky errors, should be used
AND once any errors have been resolved, a blue successful notification should display stating that changes have been saved

title: User wants to see "Terms Changed" in extension checkbox on Payroll if certain conditions met
User wants to be able to Re-Calculate values based on their entries
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and viewing the Payroll Tab in edit mode
AND "Re-Calculate" button is available on the tab 
AND edits have been made to Season Days section, CBT Override rate, or Manual Supersede Offset Rate
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the "Re-Calculate" button
custom_expected:
THEN the system should take into account any edits on the page and re-calculate the Payroll information for the As Of date currently being viewed
AND re-calculated values should not be maintained until the user Saves the Payroll tab

title: User wants to enter a manual supersede Offset for a Payroll's "As Of" date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and viewing payroll tab in edit mode
AND "Manual Supersede Offset" field is available in the Additional Settings section
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Manual Supersede Offset" field in the Additional Settings section
custom_expected:
THEN default value for this field should be blank - not 0
AND user should be able to enter in a valid number
AND clicking re-calculate should reload the As Of Date Payroll with the newly calculated values using the entered rate
AND saving the Payroll tab should save the entered Manual Supersede Offset for the entered as of date and the screen should display the As Of Date using the new calculation when it refreshes into View mode
AND if a new As Of Date is created by the system for this Payroll tab, or is created manually, the system should carry forward the entered Manual Supersede Offset to future As Of Dates until it is cleared

title: User wants multiple credits/refunds from the same source to roll up into single column
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and viewing the payroll screen
AND multiple credits or refunds exist for the same year, org, and type
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the payroll screen
custom_expected:
THEN all of the multiple credits and refunds that exist for the same year, org, and type should be rolled into a single column
AND if rolled up column gets manually modified the adjustments should be applied evenly across the rolled up records on save

title: User wants to reset modified values for an "As Of" date back to original calculations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and viewing an "As Of" date on the payroll tab in edit mode
AND one or more values for the Payroll OR Season Days have been manually modified for the "As Of" date being viewed
AND "Reset Values" button is available on the bottom of the tab
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Reset Values" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should  launch a popover that allows the user to select whether they want to reset the values for the Payroll section, the Season Days section, or both
AND only the sections that have been manually modified should be available to be selected. (If Payroll was not modified for this as of date, but Season Days were, then only Season Days is available to be selected)
AND when at least one of the sections is selected in the popup, the "Reset" button should be enabled
AND clicking "Reset" should refresh the page to display the originally calculated values for whichever section was reset
AND the modified values should be maintained until the user hits "Save" on the entire form
AND if the user cancels out of edit mode, then the modified values should be re-displayed in place of the calculated when the screen reloads into View mode
AND if the user Saves the changes, the modified values should no longer be available

title: LRD user wants to receive approvals item when new As Of Date has been created for MJC Payroll Tab that requires LRD verification
custom_preconds: GIVEN conditions are met to leave the LRD Verified checkbox unchecked for a new as of date
custom_steps: WHEN the new As Of date has been created by the system (either by a batch earning a bonus earned or a manual save to a contract or any other means)
custom_expected:
THEN an approvals item should be generated for the LRD MJC Admin user to draw their attention to the relevant contract
AND Date should be the Date the new As Of date was set to
AND Org/Club From should be the Org of the contract
AND Player should be the player's Last, Roster
AND Trans Type should read "Contract Payroll Data requires LRD Verification"
AND Clicking the type column should take the user to the Payroll tab of the appropriate contract
AND Clicking the Player's Name should take the user to the player's player history on their profile

title: Display of accordion headers with a long title a and a toggle is incorrect at smaller screen sizes
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing a page with an accordion header in EBIS2
custom_steps: WHEN user views the screen on a screen size below 768px
custom_expected:
THEN the following updates should be applied:
- Assign font-size:12px; to .panel-title 
- Decrease the left and right padding of .btn-ebis-toggle  .btn to 6px
- Ellipse titles at some max-width

title: As a User, I want to edit users on the email utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN Winter League Requests have already been integrated into the email utility
custom_steps: WHEN user with email utility edit permissions navigates to email utility page
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to add users to the utility for Winter League Requests
AND user should be able to remove users from utility for Winter League Requests
AND user should be able to save edits to utility

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Trade Checklist from a Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is viewing a Waiver Claim Assignment
AND there is a Print button at the bottom of a waiver claim assignment
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Print button
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow the user to choose to print a Trade Checklist
and printing the Trade Checklist should generate a trade checklist for the WCA just like for an outright trade

title: Hide System Features link on screen sizes smaller than 768px
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to access EBIS 2.0 on a phone or other device with screen size smaller than 768px
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in on the small screen device
custom_expected: THEN "System Features" link should not be visible

title: Hide Quick Jump on screen sizes smaller than 768px
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to access EBIS 2.0 on a phone or other device with screen size smaller than 768px
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in on the small screen device
custom_expected: THEN "Quick Jump" buttons should not be visible

title: As a user I want a mobile friendly way to interact with buttons on a form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to view EBIS 2.0 on a small screen or mobile device
custom_steps: WHEN user loads EBIS at some screen width or device detection
custom_expected:
THEN the behavior of buttons on a form should change to what is outlined in the wireframe
AND a container should be fixed to the bottom of the mobile browser
AND touching or swiping this up should reveal the form buttons
AND if the button container is open the arrow at the top should point down instead of up
AND the most important button(blue) should be at the bottom, the next on top of that, and so on. (On desktop the buttons display from left to right in order of importance, on a phone they will display from bottom to top)
AND clicking a button should perform that action and close the button container
